price: Àwọn ẹrúsìn Àjọkẹ́-ayé ni àwọn tó ń rìn jẹ́ẹ́jẹ́ lórí ilẹ̀. Nígbà tí àwọn òpè bá sì dojú ọ̀rọ̀ kọ wọ́n, wọn yóò sọ ọ̀rọ̀ àlàáfíà.
arabic: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمۡشُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هَوۡنٗا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ قَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waʿibādu al-raḥmāni alladhīna yamshūna ʿalā al-arḍi hawnan wa-idhā khāṭabahumu al-jāhilūna qālū salāman
